thread.title: Nigeria: Boko Haram - Troops Clear Damaturu - Biu Road of Mines
thread.title_full: Nigeria: Boko Haram - Troops Clear Damaturu - Biu Road of Mines

title: Nigeria: Boko Haram - Troops Clear Damaturu - Biu Road of Mines
text:
Nigeria: First Nation Seeks More Training for Flight Marshallers By Bayo Oladeji 
A team of the Nigerian Army Special Forces, Explosives Ordinance Devices with support from the Nigeria police and members of the local vigilante have cleared Damaturu-Biu road of mines. 
This was made known is a statement issued by the acting director of army public relations, Col Sani Kukasheka Usman, as an update on the bombing incident that took place at a praying ground in Yobe on Sallah day when two female suicide bombers struck. 
According to him, "During the painstaking and thorough operation, four improvised explosives devices (IEDs) planted by suspected Boko Haram terrorists were discovered and successfully detonated. Commuters are encouraged to use the road as adequate security is being provided. The Nigerian army wishes to further enjoin the public to be more security conscious and report any suspicious persons and movements to the security agents." Nigeria
